tech_news.description: Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 isn't the only 2025 blockbuster on sale

tech_news.title: Pixel 10 phones are now compatible with AirDrop - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google announced it’s added AirDrop-compatible file sharing that works between Pixel 10 devices and iPhones.

tech_news.title: As Windows turns 40, Microsoft faces an AI backlash - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft wants to turn Windows into an agentic OS, but it’s facing an AI backlash. Windows users seem to be fed up of the direction the OS is heading in.

tech_news.title: Google’s Gemini is now on Android Auto - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google announced that its Gemini AI assistant is now available for Android Auto for help with navigation, errands, or just brainstorming.

tech_news.title: All These Games Sold Exactly One Copy In The US In October - GameSpot
tech_news.description: Someone bought a copy of The Incredibles 2: Rise of the Underminer for Game Boy Advance in October. Was it you?

tech_news.title: Live: Watch The 2025 Xbox Partner Preview Showcase Here - Pure Xbox
tech_news.description: Likely the final Xbox showcase of the year!

tech_news.title: Apple’s AirPods Pro 3 just got their biggest discount ahead of Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: We’ve seen the AirPods Pro 3 get a few modest discounts in recent weeks, but they’re now cheaper than ever ahead of Black Friday.

tech_news.title: How one Unknown Worlds exec sought to take down Krafton - Game Developer
tech_news.description: Charlie Cleveland seemingly documents advice from former Nexon CEO Owen Mahoney in a series of notes submitted as evidence in his trial against Krafton.

tech_news.title: Own the Extravagant Residence of Your Dreams in GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills - Rockstar Games
tech_news.description: You’ve already built an empire. Now let Prix Luxury Real Estate erect your palace in GTA Online: A Safehouse in the Hills, coming this December.
